titles.title: Dental Coverage Value and Transparency Act of 2011
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to ensure health care coverage value and transparency for dental benefits under group health plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/10/2011--Introduced. Dental Coverage Value and Transparency Act of 2011 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to prescribe certain health care coverage value and transparency requirements for dental benefits under group health plans.
